raw_comment: I noticed that men reach out to their parents less than women. I also noticed how young men are also less likely to reach out to people than young women in general. I wonder why this is the case. This relates to my community because I often see old parents who look sad and those who don't and maybe it's because they have sons who don't reach out but some have daughters who do.
ace_sentences: I noticed that men reach out to their parents less than women.
I noticed that young men are less likely to reach out to people than young women.
I wonder why this is the case.
I often see old parents who look sad.
I often see old parents who do not look sad.
Some sons do not reach out to their parents.
Some daughters reach out to their parents.
Maybe some old parents look sad because they have sons who do not reach out to them.
